channel.title: Social Media on Neil Kale
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on Neil Kale

item.title: Social Media
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog! #

This is my first post on my personal website. I’m excited to share my thoughts and experiences here.

What You Can Expect #

  • Technical posts about machine learning and AI research
  • Personal reflections on my journey as a graduate student
  • Project updates from my work at CMU and Scale AI
  • Travel stories and sketches from around the world

Getting Started #

I built this site using Hugo with the beautiful Typo theme. The setup process was straightforward, and I’m looking forward to customizing it further.
